meanings.definition: Congous: a type of black tea
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping on a warm cup of congous in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of congous filled the room as the tea steeped in the pot.
meanings.sent3: At the tea party, everyone wanted a taste of the rare congous blend.
meanings.sent4: Her love for congous was as deep as the rich color of the brewed tea.
meanings.sent5: The delicate flavor of congous lingered on my taste buds long after I finished the cup.

meanings.definition: Congous: a plural form of congo, a type of African dance
meanings.sent1: The rhythmic beats of the drums accompanied the energetic congous.
meanings.sent2: The dancers moved gracefully to the traditional congous music.
meanings.sent3: During the festival, the children performed a lively congous for the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for congous was evident in every step she took on the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The joyous celebration was incomplete without the vibrant congous performances.

meanings.definition: Congous: a plural form of congo, a type of African river
meanings.sent1: The majestic wildlife gathered near the congous to quench their thirst.
meanings.sent2: The villagers relied on the waters of the congous for fishing and irrigation.
meanings.sent3: Legend has it that a mystical creature resides in the depths of the congous.
meanings.sent4: The tranquility of the congous mirrored the peace in the surrounding village.
meanings.sent5: The lush greenery along the banks of the congous created a picturesque scene.
